@RyanAFournier Actually, Obama himself suggested it on April 30, 2009.  The CDC recommended closing schools if a student was infected (5/5/09).  And schools that did have confirmed cases shut down for weeks (726 districts nationwide)

Also, not comparable situations — COVID-19 is clearly worse.
